name: rhmsubccat
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), ccat))

stmt.origin: subccat(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), cfv(crngc, c0), c1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), ccat))
-| wceq(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubc, cfv(crngc, c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)∈ Cat)
⊣ ((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)=((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Subcat `(RngCat ` c0)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), ccat))
-| wceq(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubc, cfv(crngc, c0))))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ ((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)=((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(Subcat `(RngCat ` c0)))

body.origin: |- wceq(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubc, cfv(crngc, c0))))

stmt.origin: rhmsubc(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)
stmt.pretty: rhmsubc(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubc, cfv(crngc, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(crngc, c0))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cin(crg, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cres(crh, cxp(c4, c4)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c1 ∈(Subcat `(RngCat ` c0)))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c3 =(RngCat ` c0)
⊣ (w0 → c4 =(Ring ⋂ c0))
⊣ c1 =(RingHom |`(c4 × c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(crngc, c0), cresc, c1), ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(crngc, c0))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cin(crg, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cres(crh, cxp(c4, c4)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →((RngCat ` c0)[|`cat]c1)∈ Cat)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c3 =(RngCat ` c0)
⊣ (w0 → c4 =(Ring ⋂ c0))
⊣ c1 =(RingHom |`(c4 × c4))

comment: The restriction of the category of non-unital rings to the set of unital ring homomorphisms is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2020.)
